name: @emdgroup/react-query
description: React hooks for the fetch API with support for client-side caching

scripts.docs:build: rm -rf docs README.md && typedoc --hideInPageTOC --excludeNotDocumented --disableSources --theme github-wiki src/index.ts
scripts.docs: npm run docs:build && ts-node ../../bin/merge-docs Exports.md RequestOptions.md QueryResponse.md HTTPError.md
scripts.prepack: npm run docs && rm -rf dist && tsc --build --force

author: Moritz Onken <onken@netcubed.de>
